easy.sun: The star at the center of our solar system.
easy.tree: A tall plant with a trunk and branches.
easy.apple: A common red or green fruit.
easy.computer: An electronic device for processing data.
easy.music: Organized sounds that are pleasant to hear.
easy.flower: The colorful part of a plant.
easy.garden: A place where plants are grown.
easy.ocean: A large body of salt water.

medium.challenge: A task that tests someone's abilities.
medium.programming: The process of writing computer code.
medium.algorithm: A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem.
medium.software: Programs and operating systems used by computers.
medium.interface: A point where two systems meet and interact.
medium.function: A block of code that performs a specific task.
medium.variable: A storage location with a symbolic name.
medium.debugging: The process of finding and fixing errors.
medium.repository: A storage location for software packages.

hard.cryptocurrency: Digital or virtual currency using cryptography.
hard.quantum: Related to the smallest discrete unit of any property.
hard.asynchronous: Not occurring at the same time.
hard.polymorphism: The ability to take multiple forms in programming.
hard.infrastructure: The basic physical systems of a business or nation.
hard.virtualization: Creating a virtual version of something.
hard.scalability: The ability to handle growing amounts of work.
hard.optimization: Making something as effective as possible.
hard.architecture: The fundamental organization of a system.
hard.methodology: A system of methods used in a field.
